data.name: the World According to Girl
data.detailed_description:
『 - the World According to Girl - Demo』

In this demo version, you can experience the first year of the game out of a total of seven years.
Due to the specifications of the demo version, some items and cards have been omitted.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670
